name: Game no Kanzume: Sega Games Can Vol. 1
overview: Game no Kanzume Vol. 1 (ゲームのかんづめ ＶＯＬ.１) is a compilation of Sega Meganet games, released exclusively in Japan for the Sega Mega-CD. It was released alongside a Vol.2 and was followed by Game no Kanzume Otokuyou. This compilation was partially translated by M.I.J.E.T. in that only the Phantasy Star II Text Adventures were translated. Games Included Flicky Hyper Marbles Paddle Fighter Phantasy Star II: Amia's Adventure Phantasy Star II: Huey's Adventure Phantasy Star II: Shilka's Adventure Phantasy Star II: Yushis's Adventure Pyramid Magic Pyramid Magic II Pyramid Magic III Pyramid Magic Special
